Pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a mint sprig and a kumquat wedge

name: French Tea
recipe: Place a chopped half of an orange wheel, a small chopped lime wedge and one cinnamon stick into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 1 oz of maple syrup and 2 oz of cognac
Top up with hot assam tea and stir gently
Garnish with a sprig of mint and orange zest

name: Grapefruit Fruitoccino
recipe: Fill a milkshake sundae glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.25 oz of sugar syrup and 3.5 oz of grapefruit juice
Top up with 1.5 oz of espresso coffee and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: The Vampire Diaries
recipe: Place 2 strawberries into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of strawberry syrup
Add 1 oz of homemade pepper vodka and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a half of a strawberry and a chili pepper pod

name: Captive
recipe: Place 1/4 of a peeled and sliced peach into a blender
Pour in 2 oz of pineapple juice, 0.35 oz of ginger syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a rose petal

name: Hulk
recipe: Pour 1 oz of Irish cream liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of green chartreuse

name: Hiroshima
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.75 oz of absinthe
Carefully pour in 5 drops of grenadine syrup using a drinking straw

name: Almond Coffee
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 2.25 oz of milk
Pour 1 oz of espresso and 0.5 oz of almond syrup into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass

name: Fall Colors
recipe: Place 1/4 of a lime, an orange wedge, a grapefruit wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of cranberry juice, 0.75 oz of passion fruit syrup and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a highball glass
Place the fruits from the shaker into the highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Garnish with a grapefruit wheel

name: Citrus Boom
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 4 bar spoons of orange jam into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 2 oz of vodka
Give it a good dry shake and pour into the rocks glass
Garnish with a finely chopped orange zest

name: Citrus Margarita
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of agave syrup and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with two lime wheels

name: Morning Tea
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of green iced tea, 1.5 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with small apple wedges

name: Tropical Tea
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of orange juice into an Irish coffee glass
Top up with boiling water
Garnish with two passionfruit quarters and a kumquat

name: Chinese Gimlet
recipe: Pour 1 oz of homemade viburnum cordial and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with lemon zest on a cocktail skewer

name: Five o'clock Tea
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of honey syrup, 2 oz of chamomile tea and 1.5 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Gran Torino
recipe: Place 1.5 oz of lime sorbet into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently

name: Black Cherry
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of cherry jam into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 2 oz of dark rum
Top up with pineapple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a pineapple wedge

name: Blackcurrant
recipe: Place 9 bar spoons of blackcurrant into a blender
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of blackcurrant syrup and 5 oz of cherry juice
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a sling glass
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Blackcurrant Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill a pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place 15 bar spoons of blackcurrant jam into a shaker
Pour in 1.25 oz of macadamia syrup and 1.5 oz of lemon juice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with blackcurrant berries and an orchid

name: Black October
recipe: Place 3 blackberries into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of sugar syrup
Add 1.5 oz of blackcurrant vodka and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel and a blackberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Black Flip
recipe: Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of dark beer and 1.5 oz of dark rum into a shaker
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a chilled highball glass
Serve on a saucer with a piece of dark chocolate and ground nutmeg

name: Czech Mulled Wine
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of honey, 3.5 oz of dry red wine and 1.5 oz of Becherovka into a milk pitcher
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick

name: Czech tea
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz ml of lemon juice, 0.25 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz ml of Becherovka into a milk pitcher
Add 3.5 oz of still water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with an orange wheel on a cocktail skewer

name: The Road
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of rose vermouth
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a fan of apple wedges sprinkled with ground cinnamon

name: Chamomile Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill a pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place 6 slices of ginger root into a juicer and juice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of ginger root juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of honey syrup and 15 oz of chamomile tea into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a large chili pepper

name: Sad Romance
recipe: Place a half a kiwi, peeled and chopped, and a tarragon sprig into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.75 oz of apple juice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour with ice into a highball glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a kiwi wheel and a tarragon sprig

name: Sweet Bite
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vanilla vodka
Stir gently and top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a piece of sugar on a cocktail skewer

name: Pure Passion
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the pulp of a passionfruit into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.75 oz of orange juice, 0.15 oz of caramel syrup and 0.5 oz of sugar syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a quarter of passionfruit

name: Champagne Cocktail
recipe: Place a cane sugar cube into a chilled flute glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 1 oz of cognac
Top up with champagne and stir gently

name: Diana
recipe: Fill a сollins glass to the top with crushed ice
Place a chopped cucumber half, a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the glass
Add the pulp of a quarter of passionfruit
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a thin cucumber sliver on a cocktail skewer and a quarter of passion fruit

name: Swish
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of yellow apple syrup, 0.75 oz of vodka, 0.75 oz of silver tequila and 0.75 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Top up with apple cider and stir gently
Garnish with 2 apple wheels and a raspberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Whisper
recipe: Fill a rocks glass halfway with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky and add a little bit of club soda

name: Bumblebee
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 4 oz of orange juice and 0.5 oz of caramel syrup
Add 2 oz of espresso and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wedge

name: Chocolate Currant
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of chocolate syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of blackcurrant vodka
Garnish with a lime wedge, sprinkled with ground coffee, and granulated sugar
Drink the shot and chase it with the lime

name: Chocolate Milkshake
recipe: Place 7 oz of chocolate ice cream into a milkshake mixer
Pour in 3 oz of milk and 0.75 oz of chocolate syrup
Mix without ice and pour into a milkshake sundae glass
Garnish with grated chocolate

name: Scottish Old-Fashioned
recipe: Place 1 cane sugar cube into a rocks glass, a chopped orange wedge and lemon wedge
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and a red Maraschino cherry
Muddle lightly
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Muddle and serve with muddler

name: Noise
recipe: Place 10 bar spoons of banana puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a banana wheel

name: Sorrel Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a bunch of sorrel leaves and 1 bar spoon of granulated cane sugar into a blender
Pour in 2 oz of still water
Blend without ice and fine strain into the pitcher
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with 5 slices of ginger root and 5 raspberries

name: Evolution
recipe: Place 5 red basil leaves into a shaker
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.5 oz of Benedictine and 1.5 oz of white rum
Add 1 dash of rhubarb bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a red basil leaf

name: Exotic Grog
recipe: Place finely-chopped wedges of orange, lemon and apple into an Irish coffee glass
Add 2 cloves, a pinch of ground cinnamon and ground black pepper
Pour in 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.5 oz of coconut syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with hot black tea and stir gently
Garnish with a kiwi wheel

name: Electric Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of the chaser is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Place 60 red basil leaves into a mixing glass
Pour in 1.5 oz of sugar syrup, 2.5 oz of lime juice and muddle
Finely strain into a pitcher
Top up with 27 oz of cranberry juice and stir gently
Pour gold tequila into shot glasses
Pour chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila followed by the chaser

name: Jubilee Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 0.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange and lemon zest

name: Southern Hospitality
recipe: Place a chopped watermelon pulp into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of vanilla syrup and 0.75 oz of vodka
Add a pinch of ground red pepper
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour into a chilled rocks glass with ice
Garnish with a vanilla pod

name: Bad Teacher
recipe: Place 1 cardamom seed and a chopped half of green apple into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and muddle
Pour 0.75 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a fan of green apple wedges

name: Apple Mulled Wine
recipe: Place a small apple wedge into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of honey and 5 oz of dry red wine
Add 1 bar spoon of vanilla granulated sugar, orange and lemon zests, 3 cloves, a star anise and a cinnamon stick
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with apple peel

name: Apple Temptation
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1.5 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of absinthe into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with 3 apple wedges

name: Apple Delight
recipe: Place 1 peeled and sliced apple into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of peach juice and 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a collins glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Apple Margarita
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of apple juice, 0.5 oz of ginger syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges

name: Ginger Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves into a sling glass
Fill the sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of gold rum
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and a slice of ginger root

name: Apple Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill a pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place 2 bar spoons of granulated cane sugar and a chopped lime half into a shaker and muddle
Add 5 oz of apple sorbet
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with apple wheels

name: Apple Pie
recipe: Pour 1 oz of apple juice, 0.5 oz of cinnamon syrup, 1 oz of yellow apple liqueur, 0.75 oz of vanilla vodka and 0.75 oz of homemade biscuit vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a bird carved from an apple

name: Apple Cooler
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 3 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with 3 apple wedges

name: French Kiss
recipe: Place a peeled and chopped half of a green apple into a shaker
Muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of calvados
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges

name: Berry Lemonade
recipe: Place 3 blackberries, 3 raspberries, 1 strawberry, 1 bar spoon of bilberries and 3/4 of a lime into a hurricane glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup and muddle
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and blackberries, bilberries, raspberries and strawberries

name: Berry Pimms
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 cucumber wheels, 2 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of lemongrass syrup, 1 oz of raspberry vodka and 1 oz of blackcurrant vodka
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a half of strawberry and a cucumber slice

name: Berry Twist
recipe: Place 3 blackberries, 3 raspberries, 3 strawberries and 1 bar spoon of bilberries into a blender
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 3.5 oz of pineapple juice, 3.5 oz of orange juice and 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a sling glass
Garnish with a mint sprig and a blackberry, a raspberry and a bilberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Jamaican Mule
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 6 slices of ginger root into a juicer and juice
Place 4 cucumber slices into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of ginger root juice and 2 oz of dark rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a slice of ginger root and cucumber wheels

name: Deep Sleep
recipe: Place a chopped half of apple, a sprig of rosemary into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of yellow apple syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with 2 apple wedges

name: Oriental Garden
recipe: Place couple of shiso leaves into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of rose syrup, 0.5 oz of sake, 1 oz of dry vermouth, and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a shiso leaf and lemon zest on a cocktail skewer

name: Earl Grey Gimlet
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of homemade Earl Grey gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: The Milkman
recipe: Fill a milk bottle to the top with ice cubes
Place 16 bar spoons of lychee puree and 6 bar spoons of coconut cream into a shaker
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of passionfruit juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the milk bottle
Put the foil on top and tie with a rubber band

name: Gold tequila with cucumber
recipe: Pour 1.7 oz of tequila into a shot glass
Place a sliced cucumber sprinkled with salt and pepper on a tray
Drink the tequila and chase with cucumber.

name: Silver tequila with cucumber
recipe: Pour 1.7 oz of tequila into a shot glass
Place a sliced cucumber sprinkled with salt and pepper on a tray
Drink the tequila and chase with cucumber

name: Rosso and tonic
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Add 3.3 oz of red vermouth
Fill with tonic and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with an orange slice

name: Prosecco on the rocks
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 5 oz of prosecco

name: Sandy Collins
recipe: Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of sugar syrup, and 1.7 oz of scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a Collins glass
Fill to the top with club soda
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Perfect Rob Roy
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of red vermouth, 0.5 oz of dry vermouth, and 2.5 oz of scotch whisky into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Penicillin
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of honey syrup into the shaker
Add 2 oz of scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Festive Rob Roy
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of sweet red vermouth, 0.3 oz of dry vermouth, and 0.3 oz of Drambuie into the mixing glass
Add 50 ml of Lowland single-malt whiskey and 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Campari and Tonic
recipe: Fill a wine glass with ice
Pour in 1.7 oz of Campari and fill with tonic
Carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Matanga
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Squeeze 0.8 oz of lime juice
Pour in 0.7 oz of salted caramel syrup and 1.3 oz of gold tequila
Fill with club soda and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a knife and a lime wedge

name: No Strings Attached
recipe: Pour 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of agave syrup, and 2 oz of genever into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled glass
Garnish with a salted coconut caramel

name: Roasted Negroni
recipe: A one-liter bottle is enough for about 5 cocktail glasses
Pour 10 oz of red vermouth, 10 oz of Campari, and 10 oz of London dry gin into the bottle
Add 1.7 oz of almond paste and shake
Place the bottle in the freezer for 5 hours
Filter through cheesecloth into another bottle and place in the refrigerator
Serve in a cocktail glass
Garnish with caramel popcorn on a skewer

name: Robin Hood
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of mastikha, 0.8 oz of red vermouth, and 1.7 oz of London dry gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled glass
Place a teaspoon with vanilla cream and a cranberry into the glass

name: Royal Jelly
recipe: Pour 0.7 oz of lemon juice and 2 oz of homemade ambrosia gin into the shaker
Add 0.5 oz of honey, 1 dash of cardamom bitters, and 2 dashes of choclate bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled glass
Garnish with honeycombs on a skewer

name: Fight the Flower
recipe: Pour 0.7 of quail egg whites, 0.8 of homemade chamomile syrup, and 0.5 oz of amaro into a shaker
Add 1 oz of dry vermouth and 1 oz of London dry gin and gently shake without ice
Strain into a chilled glass
Garnish with a dash of Angostura bitters and chamomile flowers

name: Hog Inna Minty
recipe: Place rocks ice into a highball glass
Pour 2 oz of madeira, 1 oz of Cynar, and 1 oz of Fernet Branca into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the highball
Garnish with mint leaves and wrap the glass with hog-print craft paper

name: I'm not a Fucking Cactus
recipe: Pour 0.1 oz of maple syrup and 0.1 oz of falernum into a mixing glass
Add 0.3 oz of Fernet Brance and 1.7 oz of mezcal
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Filter into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with craft paper on a clothespin

name: Tropicon
recipe: Fill a highball to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.3 oz of grenadine and 0.7 oz of lime juice
Add 0.7 oz of picon, 0.7 oz of maurin quina, and 0.7 oz of gentian
Fill to the top with club soda and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a dried orange wheel, mint leave, and cherry

name: Lavender Meringue Pie
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of quail egg whites, and 0.3 oz of sugar syrup into a shaker
Add 1.5 oz of limoncello and 0.7 oz of homemade lavender gin
FIll the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel and ground cinnamon

name: Oolong Tea Collins
recipe: Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.7 oz of homemade oolong cordial and 1.7 oz of vodka
Fill to the top with club soda and carefully mix with a bar spoon

name: Lost Virginity
recipe: Place an ice ball into the rocks glass
Pour 0.3 oz of amaro, 0.5 oz of Pedro Jimenez sherry, and 2 dashes of whisky bitters into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters, 0.5 of London dry gin, and 1 oz of homemade tobacco bourbon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a glass

name: Morning in the Garden
recipe: Place 4 basil leaves and 2 cucumber slices in a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.7 oz of honey syrup, and 0.8 oz of quail egg white
Add 1.7 oz of botanical gin and gently shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a basil leave and homemade citrus bitters

name: Smoky Rosemary
recipe: Place an ice ball into a rocks glass
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice and 0.7 oz of honey syrup
Add 1.7 oz of Islay single-malt whiskey and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a rosemary sprig

name: Shall We Kiss?
recipe: Place a thyme sprig and two slices of Korean red ginseng root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, and 0.8 oz of quail egg white
Add 1 dash of homemade citrus bitters and 1.5 oz of Islay single-malt whisky and carefully shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice and shake one more time
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with half a piece of toast with honey, thyme, and a wheat stalk

name: Blanc de Blanc Martini
recipe: Place four green grapes into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 0.7 of Lillet Blanc, 1 dash of lemon bitters, and 1.3 oz of London dry gin
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with three green grapes and lemon zest

name: Negroni Mezcalito
recipe: Salt the rim of the glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes
Pour in 0.3 oz of Cynar, 0.7 oz of red vermouth, and 0.5 oz of Campari
Add 0.7 oz of mezcal and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and an orange wheel

name: Negronino
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.7 oz of red vermouth, 0.5 oz of Cynar, and 0.7 oz of Campari
Add 0.7 oz of botanical gin and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with two cucumber slices and lemon zest

name: The Smoking Gun
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice
Pour 0.7 oz of sugar syrup, 1.7 oz of orange juice, and 0.7 oz of lemon juice into a shaker
Add 0.8 oz of quail egg whites and 1.3 oz of Islay single-malt whisky
Gently shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with saffron and half a passionfruit

name: Parmigiano Sour
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.7 oz of quail egg white, and 0.5 oz of honey into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of Sauternes and 0.8 oz of Pisco and shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with grated Parmesan and black ground pepper

name: Passion Dance
recipe: Fill a tiki mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of orange juice, 0.3 oz of almond syrup, and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice and shake gently
Strain into the tiki mug
Garnish with half a passionfruit

name: Bramble
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of sugar syrup
Add 1.7 oz of botanical gin and mix carefully with a bar spoon
Pour in 0.1 oz of creme de cassis and add a little bit of crushed ice
Garnish with lemon zest and two blackberries on a cocktail skewer

name: Brunchin'
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, and 0.7 oz of quail egg white into a shaker
Add 2.7 oz of tomato juice and 1.5 oz of celery gin
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a chilled glass
Garnish with vegetable chips

name: Kerman
recipe: Salt the rim of the glass
Pour 0.7 oz of lime juice, 0.7 oz pistachio syrup, and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Monochrome
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of nut liqueur and 0.3 oz of Pedro Jimenez sherry into a mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of plum bitters and 2 oz of tawny port
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled glass

name: Latin Chest
recipe: Pour 0.8 oz of homemade passionfruit syrup and 1.7 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of chartreuse bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled sour glass
Garnish with half a chili pepper, a quarter of a passionfruit, and a coriander leaf

name: Rosemary Smash
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.8 oz of lime juice, 0.8 oz of pineapple syrup, and 1.7 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a rosemary sprig and physalis

name: The Engines That Could
recipe: Pour 0.7 of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of strega, 0.7 oz of italicus, and 1.3 oz of mezcal into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled glass
Fill to the top with prosecco
Garnish with a basil leaf and half a kumquat

name: Budapest BBQ
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of peach purée into a bronze mug
Pour in 0.7 oz of lime juice and 1.3 oz of cranberry juice
Add 15 mL of maple syrup and 1.3 oz of London dry gin
Fill the bronze mug with crushed ice
Mix well with a swizzle stick
Add a little bit more crushed ice
Garnish with a torch-toasted marshmellow on a skewer

name: White Negroni
recipe: Pour 1 oz of white vermouth, 1 oz of gentian, and 1 oz of London dry gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled glass

name: Take Me Home
recipe: Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.7 oz of lime juice and 1.3 oz of vodka
Add 3 bar spoons of raspberry purée and fill to the top with ginger beer
Carefully mix with a bar spoon
Place 5 leaves of green basil, a pinch of lecithin, and 1 oz of milk into the blender
Blend until foamy
Garnish the cocktail with the resulting foam and mint leaves

name: Superb Mario
recipe: Fill a Collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 0.02 oz of saffron and 0.1 oz of truffle oil in a shaker
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice and 0.7 oz of cinnamon syrup
Add 0.8 oz of quail egg white, 0.7 oz of red vermouth, and 1.3 oz of Scotch whisky
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Pour through a strainer and sieve into the Collins glass
Garnish with half a dried pineapple

name: Boulevardier #3
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of red vermouth and 1 oz of red bitter
Add 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky and mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with orange zest

name: Ginger Monkey
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.7 oz of scotch whisky
Fill to the top with ginger beer and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with orange zest

name: Jam Sour
recipe: Fill a jar to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of raspberry jam, and 0.1 oz of sugar syrup into a shaker
Add 1 dash of orange bitters and 1.7 oz of scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the jar
Fill to the top with club soda
Garnish with an orange wedge

name: Lazy Old Fashioned
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.2 oz of sugar syrup, 2 dashes of Angostura bitters, and 2 oz of scotch whisky into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Finders Keepers
recipe: Fill a canning jar to the top with crushed ice
Place 0.1 oz of ginger root, 0.1 oz of lemongrass, and 0.1 oz of mint into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of agave syrup, and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Pour through a strainer and sieve into the canning jar
Top with ginger beer

name: Sherlock Tones
recipe: Fill a tiki mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice and 2.7 oz of apple juice into a shaker
Add 0.7 oz of sugar syrup and 1.7 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the tiki mug
Fill to the top with ginger beer
Garnish with a scoop of coconut ice cream in a waffle cone, a mint spring, and cowberries

name: Baklava New Fashioned
recipe: Place rocks ice in a rocks glass
Pour 0.15 oz of honey syrup and 0.5 oz of red vermouth into a shaker
Add 0.15 oz of orange flower water and 1.7 oz of homemade baklava elixir
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with crumbled baklava in a craft paper cone on a clothespin

name: Halva Gin Tonic
recipe: Fill a cognac glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.7 oz of homemade tahini gin and 1 oz of homemade banana gin
Add 3 dashes of orange flower water and 3 dashes of rose water
Fill to the top with tonic and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with melted dark chocolate and crushed roasted peanuts

name: Maryam Invisible
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.3 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of cheese brine, and 0.1 oz of sugar syrup into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of red Tabasco sauce, 2.7 oz of homemade tomato water, and 1.3 oz of homemade Worcestershire sauce vodka
Fill the shaker with ice, closer, and roll from one hand to the other for several minutes, keeping it vertical
Strain into the rocks glass and garnish with a basil leaf
Serve on a tray with grilled pita

name: Modernist Falafel
recipe: Place the ice ball in the rocks glass
Place 0.09 oz of green basil and 0.15 oz of salt in the shaker and muddle
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, and 0.15 oz of mastiha into the shaker
Add 0.15 oz of homemade herbal oil, 0.15 oz of green chartreuse, and 1.75 oz of homemade falafel vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass through a sieve and strainer
Garnish with a slice of radish

name: Ottoman's Secret
recipe: Place 0.3 oz of pistachios, 0.15 oz of salt, and 0.15 oz of honey in a blender
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of pistachio syrup, and 0.5 oz of yoghurt liqueur into the blender
Add 2 dashes of orange flower water, 2 dashes of rose water, 0.25 oz of white vermouth, and 1.5 oz of London dry gin
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a goblet
Garnish with crushed pistachios

name: Chipotle Chillón
recipe: Spray absinthe over the glass
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of quail egg white, and 1 oz of spiced syrup into a shaker
Add 1.3 oz of mezcal and shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with vegetable chips

name: Risueño
recipe: Place 1 pc of grapefruit zest, 0.1 oz of rosemary, and 0.3 oz of sugar syrup into the shaker
Pour in 0.7 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of quail egg white, and 0.7 oz of silver tequila
Add 2 dashes of orange flower water and 2 oz of fino sherry and gently shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a cocktail glass
Garnish with an orange wheel and a thyme sprig on a clothespin

name: Steam Drunk
recipe: Place a bar spoon in a tea glass
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.3 oz of lemon juice, 0.3 oz of orange juice, 0.3 oz of quail egg white, and 0.8 oz of vanilla syrup
Add 2 dashes of rhubarb bitters, 1 oz of picon, 1 oz of homemade tea pisco, and 1 oz of silver tequila
Shake carefully without ice
Place rocks ice in the shake and shake one more time
Strain into a teapot
Close the lid and pour the cocktail into a teacup
Garnish with a mint spring, cinnamon, and orange zest

name: Tonico Sprenger
recipe: Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 0.3 oz of cardamom and 0.3 oz of vodka into the shaker and muddle
Strain the cardamom vodka into the highball through the strainer and sieve
Pour 1.25 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of simple syrup, and 1.5 oz of London dry gin into the glass
Fill to the top with ginger beer and stir with a bar spoon
Garnish the cocktail with a slice of cucumber and cinnamon sticks

name: Yellow Chili
recipe: Fill the shot glass with crushed ice
Pour 1.3 oz of ginger beer into one of the test tubes and garnish with a violet flower
Pour 1.3 oz of tonic into the other test tube and garnish with a mint leaf
Place the test tubes into the shot glass
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice and 0.3 oz of quail egg white into the shaker
Add 1 oz of simple syrup and 1.5 oz of scotch
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain through a strainer into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish the glass with a chili pepper
Serve on a tray along with the test tubes in the shot glass

name: Beets by Tjoget
recipe: Juice 2 slices of ginger root
Pour 0.1 oz of ginger juice, 0.75 oz of lemon juice, and 1 oz of coconut syrup into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of homemade nutmeg bitters and 1.75 oz of homemade beet vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: La belle epoque
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of simple syrup into the shaker
Add 2 dashes of absinthe and 1 oz of cognac
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled flute
Top up with prosecco and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a maraschino cherry

name: Pink Rhino
recipe: Salt the rim of the glass
Fill a Collins glass with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of grenadine, and 1.75 oz of London dry gin
Top up with grapefruit soda and carefully mix with a bar spoon

name: Salty caramel
recipe: Place the rocks ice in the rocks glass
Pour 0.35 oz of simple syrup, 0.35 oz of fino sherry, and 0.35 oz of amaro into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of black walnut bitters and 1 oz of cognac
Fill the glass with ice cubes and mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the rocks glass

name: Apium or Opium
recipe: Fill a Collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of simple syrup and 2 oz of mezcal into the shaker
Add 3 dashes of celery bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the Collins glass
Fill to the top with club soda
Garnish with celery salt

name: Bartender’s choice
recipe: Place the rocks ice into the champagne saucer
Pour 0.75 oz of simple syrup, 0.75 oz of lime juice, and 0.5 oz of grapefruit juice into the shaker
Add 0.35 oz of Campari, 0.75 oz of Lillet Blanc, and 1 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the champagne saucer
Garnish with grapefruit zest

name: Mex Man
recipe: Pour 0.7 oz of agave syrup and 1 oz of red vermouth into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 2 oz of mezcal
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and serve on a tray

name: Monsieur Negroni
recipe: Place the rocks ice in the rocks glass
Pour in 1 oz of red vermouth, 1 oz of campari, and 1 dash of homemade cardamom bitters
Add 1 dash of homemade citrus bitters and 1 oz of botanical gin
Carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with orange zest

name: Penicillin #2
recipe: Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of ginger syrup into a shaker
Add a pinch of salt, 0.5 oz of agave syrup, and 2 oz of Islay single-malt whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and gently shake
Strain into the glass
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Ben Buckler
recipe: Fill the wine glass with ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of amaro, 0.75 oz of vodka, and 3 oz of homemade passionfruit wine
Add a splash of still water and mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Busby’s Bore
recipe: Make juice from 0.75 oz of rhubarb
Place the rocks ice into the rocks glass
Pour 0.75 oz of rhubarb juice and 0.5 oz of lemon juice into the shaker
Add 0.75 oz of homemade citrus oil and 0.75 oz of amaro
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Fill to the top with club soda
Garnish with a lemon wedge and a mint sprig

name: Jindill

ingredients.name: Homemade kaffir lime-infused white cacao liqueur

recipe: Pour 1.25 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of quail egg white, and 0.75 oz of macadamia syrup into a shaker
Add 0.25 oz of homemade kaffir lime infused white cacao liqueur and 2 oz of London dry gin
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a lime leaf

name: Bijoux Caju
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 3 oz of cashew juice, and 0.5 oz of falernum into the shaker
Add 0.5 oz of green chartreuse, 0.75 oz of homemade hops-infused white vermouth, and 2 oz of london dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled clay pot
Garnish with a mint sprig and close with a lid

name: Gimlet alla Modenese
recipe: Place the rocks ice in the champagne saucer
Pour 0.5 oz of homemade Modena cordial and 2 oz of London dry gin into the mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the champagne saucer
Garnish with a piece of parmesan

name: Sherish Cobbler
recipe: Fill the wine glass with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.25 oz of almond syrup, and 2 oz of homemade portobello-infused vermouth
Add 1 oz of london dry gin and 2 oz of Oloroso sherry, then carefully mix with a bar spoon
Sprinkle on a little bit of crushed ice
Garnish with a thyme sprig, lemongrass, and sesame seeds

name: Victorian Fizz
recipe: Fill the Collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of yuzu liqueur and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill to the top with pineapple soda and mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with matcha

name: Ay Candela
recipe: Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of agave syrup into the shaker
Add 0.75 oz of mango syrup, 0.15 oz of coriander, and 1.5 oz of mirto
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Add 2 dashes of tea bitters
Garnish with a dried orange wheel

name: Biggie Small Doors
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of homemade grapefruit-dill cordial, 1 oz of gentian, and 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters into the shaker
Add 0.06 oz of salt, 1 oz of maurin quina, and 0.5 oz of grappa
Fill the shaker with ice, close, and roll in a vertical position from one hand to the other for several minutes
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and fill to the top with apple cider
Garnish with a sprig of dill

name: Bloody Homie
recipe: Rim the rocks glass with ground red pepper
Make 0.25 oz of cucumber juice and pour into the shaker
Add 0.25 oz of lemon juice, 1.25 oz of tomato juice, 0.25 of soy sauce, and 2 dashes of sesame oil
Pour in 0.25 of mirto, 0.5 oz of maurin quina, and 1 oz of homemade bonito flakes vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the chilled glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel

name: Pandan in the air
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice and 1 oz of quail egg white into the shaker
Add 2 oz of mango syrup and 2.25 oz of Scotch whisky
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into a chilled glass

name: 560 State Street
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of Benedictine and 0.75 of dry vermouth into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of chocolate bitters and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Chai’d & True
recipe: Pour 2 oz of homemade masala bourbon into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of chocolate bitters and 0.15 oz of cinnamon syrup
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the rocks glass

name: Miso Caliente
recipe: Pour 1 0z of lemon juice and 1 oz of homemade miso syrup into the shaker
Add 3 dashes of homemade chili vodka and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a leaf of laminaria

name: South China iced tea
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of honey, and 0.3 oz of kumquat jam into the shaker
Add 1 oz of cold smoked tea and 1.5 oz of scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain through a strainer and sieve into a chilled rocks glass
Garnish with a rosemary sprig and a sugared kumquat on a skewer

name: Jimador Oriental
recipe: Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 5 oz of mango, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, and 1 oz of lychee syrup into the shaker
Add 0.75 oz of Campari and 2 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain through a strainer and sieve into the rocks glass
Garnish with a dried lime wheel, lemongrass, mint, and lychee

name: Presidente Gibson
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 2.5 oz of London dry gin into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Light the torch over the cocktail and squeeze the oil from the lemon zest into the flame

name: Sweet liberty Pina colada
recipe: Place 4 oz of pineapple and 3 oz of coconut cream into the blender
Pour in 1 oz of pineapple juice and 0,75 oz of coconut rum
Add 0,75 oz of spiced rum and 0,75 oz of aged rum
Sprinkle a scoop of crushed ice into the blender and blend
Pour into the hurricane glass
Top with 0.3 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry
Garnish with a maraschino cherry, mint, and umbrella

name: Sweet Potato Painkiller
recipe: Make juice from 5 oz of sweet potato
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.75 oz of orange juice, 2 oz of sweet potato juice, 1.5 oz of coconut cream, and 0.3 oz of Pimento Dram
Add 0.75 oz of coconut rum, 0.75 oz of spiced rum, and 0.75 oz of aged rum
Shake gently without ice
Strain through the strainer and sieve into the hurricane glass
Garnish with an orange wheel and a mint sprig

name: Whisky flip
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white and 1 oz of Pedro Jimenez sherry into the shaker
Add 2 dashes of Peychaud’s bitters, 1 oz of homemade rum raisin liqueur, and 1 oz of Lowlands single-malt whisky
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with coconut flakes

name: Rubino seco
recipe: Place the rocks ice in the cocktail glass
Pour 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of Lillet Rouge into the mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Fernet Branca, 1 oz of blended sweet sherry, and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass

name: Therapy
recipe: Fill the sake bottle with ice cubes
Pour in 3 oz of homemade mango-cashew horchata and 0.5 oz of lime juice
Add 0.5 oz of homemade wheat cordial and 2 oz of scotch whisky
Carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a violet and serve in a sake glass

name: Tiki Monkey
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.6 oz of lime juice, and 0.15 oz of banana puree into the tiki mug
Add 2 dashes of sesame oil, 0.6 oz of maple syrup, 0.5 oz of Pimento Dram, and 1.7 of homemade peanut butter-washed rum
Fill the mug with crushed ice and mix well using the swizzle stick
Sprinkle a little crushed ice on top
Garnish with a pineapple leaf, banana rounds, redcurrant and powdered sugar

name: Vive lavande!
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz passionfruit juice, 0.3 oz of lemon juice, and 0.3 oz of lavender honey into the shaker
Add 0.15 oz of apricot jam, 0.5 oz of Italicus, and 1.7 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled glass
Garnish with a mint sprig and lavender

name: City of dreams
recipe: Fill the cognac glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 1 dash of apple cider vinegar, and 0.25 oz of amaro into the shaker
Add 3 dashes of fennel bitters, 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur, and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake carefully
Pour through a strainer into the cognac glass
Garnish with a mint sprig and an orchid flower

name: Far eastern gimlet
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lime cordial and 1 dash of absinthe into the shaker
Add 1 dash of orange bitters and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with an anise star

name: Poet's dream
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of fino sherry, 0.3 oz of Benedictine, and 0.3 oz of dry vermouth into the mixing glass
Add 1 dash of citrus bitters, 2 dashes of walnut bitters, and 1.5 oz of London dry gin
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with lemon zest and walnuts on a skewer

name: Sailor's fizz
recipe: Fill the sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, and 1 oz of maurin quina
Add 1 oz of pisco and 1 oz of homemade spiced hibiscus gin
Fill to the top with soda water and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a lemon wheel, rosemary spring, and a rosebud

name: Clay jay-aged negroni
recipe: Place the rocks ice into the cognac glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of red bitters and 20 ml of red vermouth
Add 45 ml of homemade spiced hibiscus gin and mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with an orchid

name: Fake melon
recipe: Place the rocks ice in the rocks glass
Place 1.35 oz of peach puree and 0.35 oz of lemon juice in the shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of pistachio syrup and 0.5 oz of Japanese whisky
Add 1 oz of calvados
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with melon rind and ground lemon zest

name: Le pinale
recipe: Place the ice ball in the rocks glass
Pour 0.65 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, and 0.15 oz of green chartreuse into the shaker
Add 3 dashes of eucalyptus tincture and 1.5 oz of homemade ghee-washed damsol
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a pine cone and a mint sprig on the saucer

name: Swindler sour
recipe: Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, and 3 dashes of yuzu liqueur
Add 1 dash of orange flower water, 1 dash of salt tincture, 0.75 oz of soju, and 0.75 oz of grappa
Gently shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a chrysanthemum and thyme sprig

name: The stone-cold latte
recipe: Place 0.3 oz of full-leaf green tea and 3 oz of milk into the pitcher
Mix and heat without reaching a boil
Pour 0.7 oz of sugar syrup and 3 oz of tea into the shaker
Add 0.35 oz of cognac and 1 oz of soju
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Pour through a strainer and sieve into a chilled glass
Garnish with a thyme sprig and anise

name: Black tail rum & cola
recipe: Place 2 pcs rocks ice into the highball
Pour in 0.75 oz of homemade cola syrup and 0.1 oz of Fernet Branca
Add 1 dash of Jerry Thomas bitter and 1 oz of white rum
Fill to the top with prosecco and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with homemade citrus oleo

name: Strawberry Daiquri
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice and 0.75 oz of strawberry syrup into the shaker
Add in 2.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the champagne saucer

name: Black rock
recipe: Pour 0.25 oz of Drambuie and 0.25 oz of Islay single-malt whisky into the mixing glass
Add 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 2 oz of genever
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir carefully with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Place a thermometer into the glass and bring the temperature of the cocktail down to 4°C

name: Lambanog mule
recipe: Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of pineapple juice, and 1 oz of yellow banana syrup
Add 1.15 oz of cold green tea, 1.5 oz of coconut vodka, and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill to the top with ginger beer and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with a mint spring, cinnamon-covered pineapple, sesame seed-covered physalis, and a cowberry covered in powdered sugar

name: Blood Diamond
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of Fernet Branca and 1 oz of cynar into the mixing glass
Add in 1 oz of Benedictine and 1 oz of cognac
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the champagne saucer
Garnish with a dried orange wheel on a clothespin

name: Faith & Trust
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of Porto Branco and 0.75 oz of Italicus into the shaker
Add in 2 dashes of homemade cardamom bitters and 1.5 oz of homemade quinine liqueur with pineapple
Fill the shaker with ice, close it, and roll vertically from one hand to the other for several minutes
Strain into a chilled flute and fill to the top with prosecco
Garnish with dried pineapple and two orchid flowers

name: Miss Roza Fizz
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 2 oz of rose syrup into the shaker
Add 1.5 oz of homemade mandarin peel gin
Fill the shaker with ice, close it, and roll vertically from one hand to the other for several minutes
Strain into a chilled glass
Fill to the top with soda water
Garnish with a lollipop, dried rose petals, and a scoop of lime sorbet

name: Tiger Lily
recipe: Make juice from 3 oz of sweet bell pepper
Place 0.75 oz of mango purée and 0.75 oz of passionfruit purée into the shaker
Pour in 0.3 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup
Add 5 dashes of basil tincture and 1.5 oz of homemade Szechuan pepper vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Fill to the top with prosecco
Garnish with a green basil leaf and saffron

name: Burdock Sazerac
recipe: Place the ice ball into the rocks glass
Pour in 0.5 oz of maple syrup, 0.1 oz of absinthe, and 0.5 oz of mastikha
Add 1 dash of Peychaud’s bitters, 1 dash of chocolate bitters, and 2 oz of cognac
Carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with orange zest

name: Indian fizz
recipe: Fill the highball with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of soda water and 2 oz of homemade Indian mix
Fill to the top with tonic and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with ground cinnamon

name: The Double Talk
recipe: A one-liter portion makes enough for about 5 rocks glasses
Pour 10 oz of sugar syrup, 6.5 oz of Campari, and 5 oz of soy flour into the pitcher
Add in 6.5 oz of yogurt, 6.5 oz of white vermouth, and 13 ozof Scotch whisky
Carefully stir until all ingredients are evenly mixed
Filter the mixture into a separate container through the cheesecloth several times until the liquid becomes clear
Serve in rocks glasses with rocks ice and arugula

name: Zuke
recipe: Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Make 0.5 oz of cucumber juice and pour it into the glass
Pour in 2 oz of homemade tomato water and 0.75 oz of sloe gin
Add 0.15 oz of white wine vinegar and 1 oz of homemade shiso-kombu vodka
Carefully stir with a bar spoon
Garnish with a cherry tomato and a cucumber slice on a skewer

name: Espiga
recipe: Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice into the shaker
Add 1 dash of liquorice bitters and 1.75 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Pour 1 oz of chilled espresso into the glass
Place a scoop of vanilla ice cream in the glass
Fill to the top with ginger beer
Garnish with an orchid flower

name: Orange rebellion
recipe: Fill the goblet to the top with ice cubes
Place 1.25 oz of passionfruit puree into the shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice and 1 oz of homemade espresso syrup
Add 2.25 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the goblet
Garnish with a dried orange wheel, coffee beans, and rosemary flowers

name: Roasted Bloody Mary
recipe: Rim the glass with salt and coffee
Place the rocks ice in the goblet
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of evil mix into the mixing glass
Add 4 oz of tomato juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into the goblet
Garnish with a rosemary sprig and olives

name: Rum Manhattan
recipe: Place the rocks ice in a cocktail glass
Pour 1 oz of homemade coffee vermouth into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of homemade cardamom bitters and 2 oz of aged rum
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with gypsophilia flowers

name: Blueberry Hill
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of blueberry puree into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters, 1 oz of Fino sherry, and 1 oz of aged rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the teacup Garnish with mascarpone cheese and lemon zest

name: Dark Side of the Moon
recipe: Fill a Collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 0.1 oz of bamboo powder into the shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of ginger syrup
Add 0.5 oz of picon and 1 oz of mezcal
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain through the strainer and sieve into the Collins
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Look at What the Light Did Now
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz l of lime juice and 0.5 oz of falernum into a shaker
Add 3 dashes of Becherovka and 2 oz of Sake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a violet flower

name: Symposium
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of amaro into a mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of Aphrodite bitters and 1 oz of single-malt Scotch whisky
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Takk for sist
recipe: Place the rocks ice in a Collins glass
Pour 0.3 oz of lemon juice and 0.7 oz of quail egg white into a shaker
Add 0.3 oz of homemade strawberry shrub, 1 oz of gentian, and 0.7 oz of akvavit
Gently shake without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into the Collins
Fill to the top with Tonic
Garnish with Angostura bitters and frozen strawberry

name: Lotus Cocktail
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of honey and 0.5 oz of lime juice into the shaker
Add 2 dashes of bergamot bitters, 1 oz of sake, and 2 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lotus leaf and a teaspoon of blue curaçao

name: Oryzae Sour
recipe: Make 1 oz of cucumber juice and pour it into the shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice and 1 oz of almond syrup
Add in 1 oz of homemade chickpea water and 2.25 oz of sake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with 5 dashes of umami bitters and thyme

name: Aegean Negroni
recipe: Place two ice balls into the rocks glass
Pour 1 oz of italicus and 1 oz of white vermouth into the mixing glass
Add in 1 oz of London dry gin
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lime leaf

name: Aegean Sangria
recipe: Pour 1 oz of homemade wine syrup into the glass
Place the rocks ice into the glass
Using a bar spoon, pour in 5 oz of vodka
Garnish with a violet flower

name: Green House Sour
recipe: Pour 0.7 oz of homemade chickpea water, 0.5 oz of sauerkraut juice, and 0.5 oz of lemon juice into the shaker
Add 0.5 oz of ancho chili liqueur and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with vegetable chips

name: Iona's Regalia
recipe: Pour 1 oz of almond milk and 1.15 oz of pumpkin spice syrup into a shaker
Add 0.7 oz of mastikha and 1 oz of scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the teacup
Garnish with ground cinnamon

name: Patron's Martini
recipe: Pour 0.3 oz of blended sweet sherry into the mixing glass
Add 2 oz of homemade pepper tequila
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with vegetable chips

name: Big Dick
recipe: Pour 0.7 oz of lime juice, 0.25 oz of sugar syrup, 0.7 oz of yellow banana syrup, and 0.25 oz of sweet blended sherry into the shaker
Add 0.5 oz of Irish whisky, 0.5 oz of gold rum, 0.5 oz of dark rum, and 1.5 oz of aged rum
Drop in 3 dashes of chocolate bitters and 3 dashes of homemade nutmeg bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the champagne saucer
Melt 1 oz of cocoa butter and dip the rocks ice into it
Place the rocks ice into the champagne saucer
Garnish the cocktail with a dried lemon wheel, a rose bud, and nutmeg

name: Forty-Four
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white and 0.7 oz of marshmallow syrup into the shaker
Add in 3 dashes of chocolate bitters, 0.5 oz of coconut rum, and 1 oz of homemade coconut oil-washed rum
Shake gently without ice
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with rose petals and nutmeg

name: Hidden Lady
recipe: Place 0.15 oz of apricot jam and 0.3 oz of orange sorbet into the shaker
Pour in 0.7 oz of lime juice, 0.25 oz of lemongrass syrup, and 0.7 oz of sake
Add in 3 dashes of nutmeg bitters, 3 dashes of orange bitters, and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the teacup
Garnish with a rosemary sprig and a dried lemon wheel

name: Macabre

ingredients.name: Homemade butter-washed cognac with tonka beans

recipe: Spray the inside and outside of the rocks glass with absinthe
Pour 0.3 oz of sugar syrup and 3 dashes of absinthe into the mixing glass
Add in 3 dashes of Peychauds bitters, 3 dashes of Angostura bitters, and 1.5 oz of homemade oil and tonka bean-washed cognac
Melt the wax from the honeycomb and add 8-9 drops into the glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a cocktail spoon
Strain into the rocks glass
Serve in a bowl with a piece of white chocolate

name: Dutch daiquiri
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of pineapple syrup into the shaker
Add 3 oz of spiced rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with dried pineapple

name: Flying Dutchman
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of spiced syrup into the shaker
Add 1 dash of orange flower water, 2 dashes of orange bitters, and 1.5 oz of genever
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the sour glass
Garnish with orange zest and a violet flower

name: Tessmanian Devil
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of Lillet Blanc, and 1 oz of Strega into the shaker
Add 1 dash of Peychaud’s bitters, 1 dash of red Tabasco sauce, and 1 oz of London dry gin
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake one more time
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with a chili pepper

name: Ponty Margarita
recipe: Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of sugar syrup
Add 1.5 oz of mezcal
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Drug of Choice
recipe: Make a crushed red pepper rim on the Collins glass
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of grapefruit juice, and 0.3 oz of sugar syrup
Add 0.15 oz of Becherovka, 0.75 oz of cachaça, and 1 oz of silver tequila
Carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime wedge

name: Vegan Demon
recipe: Place the rocks ice into the rocks glass
Place a slice of cucumber into the shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup
Add 0.5 oz of ancho chili liqueur and 1 oz of cachaça
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and gently shake
Strain through a strainer and sieve
Garnish with a slice of cucumber and a mint sprig

name: Campari Shakerato
recipe: Place 1 oz of orange into the shaker and pour in 0.5 oz of London dry gin
Add 2 oz of red bitter liqueur
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain through a strainer and sieve into the cocktail glass
Garnish with an Italian flag on a clip

name: Capitano
recipe: Place the rocks ice into the glass
Pour 1.15 of homemade pecan red vermouth and 0.3 oz of mezcal into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters, 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup, and 1.15 oz of pisco
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest and pecan

name: Hugs & Roses
recipe: Garnish the Collins glass with ground red pepper
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of honey, 1.25 oz of verjus, and 2.25 oz of apple juice
Add in 1 oz of rose vermouth and 2 oz of vodka
Carefully mix with a bar spoon

name: Martinez Bianco
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of italicus and 2 oz of white vermouth into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of orange bitters and 1 oz of London dry gin
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes and carefully mix with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with an olive on a skewer

name: Pizza Negroni
recipe: Place the rocks ice into the glass
Pour 0.15 oz of homemade tomato water and 1 oz of red vermouth into the glass
Add 3 dashes of basil tincture, 1 oz of red bitter liqueur, and 1 oz of London dry gin
Carefully mix with a bar spoon
Garnish with a pinch of oregano

name: Bandung Swizzle
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of condensed milk, 1 oz of lemon juice, and 0.5 oz of hibiscus syrup into the shaker
Add 1 oz of amaro and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a half of dried pineapple

name: Rum + Raisin
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of homemade rum liqueur with raisin into the mixing glass
Add 2 oz of dark rum
Fill the glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into a cocktail glass
Place the raisin into the cocktail

name: Banana Split
recipe: A 1.5-liter bottle should make enough for about 8 rocks glasses
Pour 25 oz of homemade whey soda with banana into a bottle with a hermetically-sealing cap
Add 16 oz of coconut rum and close the cap
Infuse for two days in the refrigerator
Serve in rocks glasses with rocks ice
Garnish with Mexican coriander leaves

name: Chocolate Ocean
recipe: A 1.5-liter bottle should make enough for about 5 Collins glasses
Pour 7 oz of honey, 33 oz of still water, and 3 oz of cognac into a blender
Add 5g of salt, 7 oz of homemade cacao distillate, and 200ml of sake
Blend gently
Filter the liquid through cheesecloth into a bottle
Serve the cocktail in a Collins glass with rocks ice
Before serving, carbonate the cocktail in a Perlini shaker
Garnish with a samphire sprig

name: New Skin
recipe: Pour 0,5 oz of homemade cold brew chocolate into the mixing glass
Add 2 oz of homemade potato vodka
Place the rocks ice into the glass and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with a charred slice of potato and dill

name: Not  a  Margarita
recipe: A  bottle  should  serve  about  10  rocks  glasses
Pour  7 oz  of  honey  vinegar  and 2 oz  of  mandarin  vinegar  into  the  blender
Add  5 oz  of  agave  syrup  and  13 oz  of  homemade  vanilla  mezcal
Blend  gently
Strain  through  the  cheesecloth  into  a  bottle
Place  3  peapods  into  a  shaker  and  muddle
Add  2 oz  of  passionfruit
Pour  out  27 oz  of  the  mixture  from  the  bottle  and  shake  gently
Strain  through  a  strainer  and  sieve  into  the  rocks  glass
Garnish  with  samphire

name: Poison  Oasis  1981
recipe: One  bottle  should  serve  about  14  rocks  glasses
Pour  7 oz of  homemade  cherry  vinegar  into  the  bottle
Add  17 oz  of  homemade  tonka  bean  bourbon
Shake  gently
Serve  in  a  rocks  glass  with  rocks  ice
Garnish  with  apple  blossoms

name: Brandy en Coke
recipe: One portion will make about 5 highballs
Pour 48 oz of cola into the mixing glass
Add 2 oz of milk and 4 oz of cognac
Mix with a bar spoon
Leave the mixture at room temperature until the milk curdles
Filter the mixture through the cheesecloth in a centrifuge to purify the drink
Serve in a highball with seaweed

name: Port of Hope
recipe: Make a coconut flake rim for the cocktail glass
Pour 1 oz of homemade smoked oleo into the mixing glass
Add 2.5 oz of homemade fruit rum and 2 oz of London dry gin
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain into the cocktail glass

name: Umfazi
recipe: Pour 1 oz of homemade lemon sherbet and 2 oz of homemade juniper vermouth into the mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters, 0.5 oz of gold rum, and 1 oz of London dry gin
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and carefully stir with a bar spoon
Strain the cocktail into a bottle
Place the lime zest into the smoker
Place the bottle and the cocktail glass under the lid and smoke them for several minutes
Garnish with homemade grapeseed oil with dill using a pipette

name: Crown melon
recipe: Pour 2 oz of homemade melon mix into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake gently
Strain into the cocktail glass
Fill to the top with prosecco
Garnish with dill and gold leaf
